```r
# By group (base R)
by(CO2$uptake,
   CO2$Treatment,
   sum)
# Calculate sum (dplyr)
CO2 %>% 
   group_by(Treatment) %>% 
   summarise( my_sum = sum(uptake) )
```

<!-- rnb-source-end -->

```r
# By group (base R)
by(CO2$uptake,
   CO2$Treatment,
   sum)
# Calculate sum (dplyr)
CO2 %>% 
   group_by(Treatment) %>% 
   summarise( my_sum = sum(uptake) )
```
